BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WHERE_STRING = #{whereString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PRIVNAME = #{privname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEEP_YEARS = #{keepYears,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SM_BUSINESS_TB set BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_DESC = #{businessDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NEED_PROCESS = #{isNeedProcess,jdbcType=CHAR}, WHERE_STRING = #{whereString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_PACKAGE = #{needPackage,jdbcType=CHAR}, PACKAGE_ORGAN = #{packageOrgan,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRIVNAME = #{privname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEEP_YEARS = #{keepYears,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select max(BUSINESS_ID) from SM_BUSINESS_TB where BUSINESS_ID not in(98,99)
